content: this is a very easy to knit beanie-style baby hat worked in stocking stitch with a ribbed border a perfect gender-neutral design it is a very versatile pattern there are so many lovely self-patterning yarns available at the moment that even a simple hat can look great or add a fancy stitch for more interest if you feel like it or work it in stripes or add a bow button or flower for decoration or add a pom-pom so many options requires dk yarn less than 30g 4mm needles sizes small preemie medium preemie large preemie 0 - 3 months 6 months 9 - 12 months happy knitting **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
